c74object.name: tap.path
c74object.digest: Report the filepaths for useful system directories
c74object.description: The tap.path object reports the location of a variety of useful folders or directories in the local context. For example the 'docs' path will return the "My Documents" folder for the current user on Windows, and the ~/Documents folder for the current user on the Mac.
